Read the next message on the postbox.

Parameters:

Returns:

unsigned char postboxHasNext (  ) 

This function returns true if the application postbox has data waiting to be read.

Parameters:
None 
Returns:
1 if true, 0 if false
void postboxSetFlags ( uint32  flags  ) 

This allows the process to set the flags of what it wants to recieve in the kernel as postbox messages.

Parameters:
32-bit integer used for bitmask.
Returns:
None
